Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.client.render

Record Class BlockNodeRendererHolder<N extends ClientBlockNode>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.kneelawk.graphlib.client.render.BlockNodeRendererHolder<N>
Type Parameters:
N - the type of ClientBlockNode that the renderer should render.
Record Components:
nodeClass - the class of the ClientBlockNode that the renderer should render.
nodeRenderer - the block node renderer for rendering this type of block node.
public record BlockNodeRendererHolder<N extends ClientBlockNode>(@NotNull Class<N extends ClientBlockNode> nodeClass, @NotNull BlockNodeRenderer<N extends ClientBlockNode> nodeRenderer) extends Record
Holds a BlockNodeRenderer and its associated class.
